content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, it's great to meet you. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I'm getting the best possible rental price for this 25 square meter apartment. Can you tell me your budget for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price.

My budget is 1000 Euros per month.

I'm also looking for a long-term rental agreement.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I'm a student and I want to have a quiet and peaceful environment to study.

I'm thinking of staying in the apartment for at least 1 year.

I don't want to negotiate any other terms, I just want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for sharing your budget and preferences, Bo Li. I understand that you're looking for a long-term rental agreement and a quiet and peaceful environment to study. Based on your budget and the size of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 900 Euros per month. This is the lowest price that I can offer while still providing a comfortable living space for you. I believe this rental price is fair and reasonable, given the location and the size of the apartment. I hope you find this proposal satisfactory and we can come to an agreement. Is there anything else you would like to discuss or negotiate?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month.

Thank you for your offer, Mister Heine.

I will pay the first month's rent in advance and sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.

I'm looking forward to moving into the apartment.

Thank you again for your help.
name: Bo Li from China

content: You're welcome, Bo Li. I'm glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 900 Euros per month. I appreciate your prompt payment of the first month's rent and your willingness to sign the lease agreement as soon as possible. I'm glad to hear that you're looking forward to moving into the apartment. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I wish you all the best in your studies and hope you have a great time in New York.
name: Heinrich Heine
